name: PhiBrows Microblading Lectures
short_description: For the first time ever PhiAcademy offers unlimited access to PhiBrows lectures from the improved PhiBrows 2018. course! These lectures are reserved only for Students, Artists and Royal Artists of our academy that want to improve their skills and technique.
long_description: The Phibrows course will be constantly updated so the ones with unlimited access will always be able to find news about microblading techniques.The most important topics covered in these lectures are color theories, skin, hygiene and technique in addition to over hundred microblading procedure videos from all PhiBrows masters from around the world.Microblading lectures are available in English, Portuguese, Spanish, French, German and Italian language. Soon, it will be available in Russian and Chinese. In order to buy your access, you must contact course@phishop.com where your role inside the Academy will be checked. After that you will get access at PhiShop to buy lectures in preferred language. When we receive payment information, you will get your unlimited access in Craft Master app.For additional information about the purchase, please contact course@phishop.com.Buy your access now at PhiShop.
